name: Guitar Catch
description:
It is your characters job to ensure that Punk does not die.

How are you going to achieve this task? By saving the Punk Rockers vital pieces of music technology - their Guitars. 

How will you catch them? Obviously, you will use a remote control purple square.

Made for Mini Jam 15 - Technology and Weekly Game Jam - Week 71 - Punks Not Dead.

Graphics by Abornaz

Music from https://freesound.org/people/FullMetalJedi/sounds/348574/
